Articles.Content:
Turns out, very little. I realized I had two Kerbal stuck in orbit for quite some time, but I had a Minmus mission I figured was more pressing. So what do you do? Scrap your carefully designed rocket and build a new one that can handle multiple scenarios? Or just strap a few lawn chairs to your rocket and go anyways? The results speak for themselves.

For those of you who found this humorous, I figured you might want a few other photos. Compared to just drifting around the planet, they probably actually enjoyed being strapped into something:

However, even the best laid plans have their flaws. In this case I'd forgotten to reconfigure the parachute to handle the extra weight. However, if you thought the TRIP was frightening, the sudden stop at the end is even worse.

Edited November 10, 2014 by Hyomoto

Whoops!

Well, looks like it all worked out in the end.
